amendment.description: To provide funding for improvements to Bowman Road and Johnnie Dodds Boulevard, Highway 17, Mt. Pleasant, South Carolina.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1961 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1961 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S13121-13122; text: CR S13122) To provide funding for improvements to Bowman Road and Johnnie Dodds Boulevard, Highway 17, Mt. Pleasant, South Carolina.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1961 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
